speaker: Saurabh Mishra
quote: The way you all collaborated to resolve the integration issues is exactly what I want to see. This is A+ work, team. I'll be nominating the project for a 'Team Spotlight Award' at the next town hall.

speaker: Shivam
quote: Thanks, Saurabh! That means a lot. On that note, we also wanted to give a huge thank you to a couple of people from other teams who were instrumental. Anjali from the Data Platform team was a massive help. The Kafka stream we rely on had data quality issues, and she worked with us late on Tuesday to deploy a fix that ensured the data was clean.
rationale: Shivam recognizes Anjali's specific contribution (working late to deploy a fix for Kafka stream data quality issues) with a clear outcome (ensuring clean data).
evidence: worked with us late on Tuesday

speaker: Devesh Mishra
quote: I'll second that. And I also want to mention Rohan from the SRE team. We were struggling with the Kubernetes ingress configuration for our new services. Rohan jumped in, quickly identified the issue with our annotations, and helped us set up the correct routing rules. We wouldn't be ready for staging without their support.
rationale: Devesh recognizes Rohan's specific contribution (identifying Kubernetes ingress configuration issues and helping set up routing rules) with a clear outcome (enabling readiness for staging).
evidence: helped us set up the correct routing rules
wouldn't be ready for staging without their support

speaker: Saurabh Mishra
quote: Thank you for calling them out. This is the kind of cross-functional partnership that makes complex projects possible. It's clear that Anjali's diligence and Rohan's expertise were critical here. I will personally send a note of thanks to both of them and make sure their managers are aware of their specific, high-impact contributions. That kind of support deserves to be celebrated.
rationale: Saurabh recognizes Anjali's contribution (diligence) with clear impact (critical to the project) and commits to formal recognition (sending a note to her and her manager).
evidence: personally send a note of thanks
make sure their managers are aware
